title: Design of Mobile-Based Science Learning Communication

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level basic science theory understanding
context.additional_context: Conducted in a digitally enabled environment, integrating synchronous/asynchronous communication tools.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to participate in communication activities for at least 150 minutes per week in a VLE (Virtual Learning Environment).
Learners will be able to improve scientific problem-solving skills by 20% through peer feedback-based task performance.
Learners will be able to create video content explaining scientific concepts using collaboration tools on a mobile platform.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
